author: Ben
content:
I think you should, uh, think... more iconicly. Something like this guy: http://www.sydneyolympicpark.com.au/__data/assets/image/0013/454/bus_icon_large.gif
Simple, yet recognizable. Then add the Scheme greek letter thing. I can't remember the name of it. I think the more it looks like a pictograph the better, personally.
